p: Of these differential metabolites, 112 metabolites were up-regulated and 175 metabolites were down-regulated in SSM compared with NSSM. The majority of differential metabolites were lipids and lipid-like molecules, phenylpropanoid and polyketides, benzenoids, organic acids and derivatives, organic oxygen compounds, and there were 30 unclassified chemicals (Fig. 4a). These results showed the process of “ Sweating” notably changed the metabolic profile of Danshen.
